#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	int t,i;
	int val[4]={0,15,30,40};
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int ps=0,pc=0,n;
		int s=0,c=0;
		scanf("%d",&n);
		char sk[n+1];
		scanf("%s",sk);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(sk[i]=='S')
			ps++;
			else
			pc++;

		if(ps==4||pc==4)
		{
			if(ps==4)
				s++;
			else
				c++;
				ps=0;
				pc=0;
		}
	}
		printf("%d-%d",s,c);
		if(ps!=0 || pc!=0)
		printf(",%d-%d\n",val[ps],val[pc]);
		else
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
